p:
Urolithiasis is a disorder of the urinary tract, which may happen due to the oxidative stress by free radical generations
22– 24 and hence natural free radical scavengers are the best answer for that disease as well. Although medicinal plants have many bioactivities, sometimes their use should be prohibited due to their toxic effects; therefore, determination of cytotoxic effects of the medicinal plants’ extracts is a pre-requisite for their ethnomedicinal use against various physiological disorders of human beings
25 .
